text: Green View Tower is a skyscraper in Tijuana, Mexico. It is in the central business district of Tijuana, the Zona Rio. It only has 58 homes. It has a mall and a penthouse. It was designed by Julio Gaeta and Luby Springall of Gaeta Springall Arquitectos. == Other websites == * Green View Tower Category:2000s establishments in Mexico Category:Skyscrapers in North America Category:Tijuana Category:Buildings and structures in Mexico Category:2009 establishments in North America
title: Green View Tower
